name: Run Monkey Run (DAYDEV)
description:
The Fine Arts Department Project and College of Creative Design  and Entertainment Technology, Dhurakij Pundit University associated with Daydev Co., Ltd presented "Ramayana Run Monkey Run".

If you love Story of Ramayana, Run Monkey Run is the best Choice. Fine Art department of Thailand present Ramayana' Run Monkey Run. Run Monkey Run redefined mobile gaming. Now get more of the exhilarating running, jumping, turning and sliding you love in Run Monkey Run.
